item.title: By: Michele Mizejewski
item.dc:creator: Michele Mizejewski
item.description: Thanks for the comments. Also, just since this was posted, a few more changes have been made based on feedback following the staff meeting. That means when the new menus go live, (soon!) they won't quite match the screen shot above.
item.content:encoded: Thanks for the comments. Also, just since this was posted, a few more changes have been made based on feedback following the staff meeting. That means when the new menus go live, (soon!) they won’t quite match the screen shot above.

item.title: By: Leslie Kleinberg
item.dc:creator: Leslie Kleinberg
item.description: I love the extra line spacing -- really improves readability. Also, think the decision to put Course Reserves in two places makes a lot of sense (and solves an old problem of where to put it!).
item.content:encoded: I love the extra line spacing — really improves readability. Also, think the decision to put Course Reserves in two places makes a lot of sense (and solves an old problem of where to put it!).

item.title: By: Jason Hedrick
item.dc:creator: Jason Hedrick
item.description: I really like the new terms being used for the top-level items and that the items in the dropdown have been thoughtfully consolidated! I think it really simplifies it for the public who probably don't know all the ins-and-outs of the library from the same perspective of those that work here.
item.content:encoded: I really like the new terms being used for the top-level items and that the items in the dropdown have been thoughtfully consolidated! I think it really simplifies it for the public who probably don’t know all the ins-and-outs of the library from the same perspective of those that work here.
